STORY DETAIL

During Edo Period, the era of samurai, there was a great samurai called the “Bereaved”. One day an astounding event occurred, he got a letter from the Shogun of the Empire

          He was ordered to go on a mission to kill the famous blacksmith, because the blacksmith had engraved the forbidden characters To bring the cursed Katana to destroy it The Samurai of the family

 accepted the mission and followed the instructions he had received, but as a result the blacksmith engraved a curse on the Katana - Only those who are worthy enough can hold the katana

3000 years Later, the cursed katana was found by Uwaki, a young boy with innocent look that recently moved into a new rent house. While Uwaki was cleaning the room.he saw the light shine bright from the katana.He followed the light and pick it up then…
